metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39323 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Line directives ("//line") can be used to bypass the restrictions on"//go:cgo_" directives, allowing blocked linker and compiler flags to bepassed during compilation. This can result in unexpected execution ofarbitrary code when running "go build". The line directive requires theabsolute path of the file in which the directive lives, which makesexploiting this issue significantly more complex.

criterions.comment: golang-1.20 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
